mapper.select: select CAL_START as cal_strart, CAL_END as cal_end, CAL_TITLE as cal_title, CAL_CONTENT as cal_content, CAL_WRITER as cal_writer from s_calendar
mapper.insert: insert into S_CALENDAR (STUDY_NO, CAL_NO, CAL_START, CAL_END, CAL_WRITER, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT) values (20, 1, sysdate, SYSDATE + 1, 'cj', '공부합시다.', '쉽다. 쉽다. 쉽다. 쉽다........' );
